column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column4: "Kasa kyerɛ Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no
column5: ma wɔmpaa hɔnho mfi Israelmba hɔn ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn no ho
column6: wɔ dza wɔtsew ho ma me no ho
column7: amma woeenngu me dzin krɔnkrɔn no ho fi: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Se hɔn dɛ
column3: obiara a ofi hom asefo nyinara mu wɔ hom ebusuasantsen mu a
column4: ɔtwe bɛn ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn a Israelmba tsew ho ma EWURADZE
column5: na ɔwɔ n'ahoɔfi wɔ no ho no
column6: ɔkra no wobotwa no efi m'enyim akyen: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Ɔbanyin biara a ofi Aaron n'asefo mu a ɔyɛ kwatanyi
column3: anaa ɔwɔ ahosen no; mma onndzi ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn no bi nnkodu dɛ no ho bɛtsew. Na obi a ɔka adze biara a fun egu ho fi
column4: anaa banyin a no ho nsu sen fi no mu;"

column2: "anaa obiara a ɔka adze biara a ɔwea
column3: dze bogu noho fi
column4: anaa banyin bi a n'ahoɔfi biara a ɔwɔ no bɛma ɔafa no ho ahoɔfi no;"

column2: "no ho nntsew araa kodu ewimbir
column3: na mma onndzi ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn no bi
column4: gyedɛ oguar wɔ nsu mu ansaana."

column2: "Na sɛ iwi kɔtɔ a
column3: no ho bɛtsew; na n'ekyir no ondzi ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn no bi

column2: "Dza noara ewu
column3: anaa mbowa atsetsew no no
column4: mma onndzi mmfa nngu noho fi: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi wondzi m'ahyɛdze do
column3: amma woeenngu ho fi na wɔaannsoa bɔn wɔ ho
column4: na woeennwuwu wɔ mu; emi nye EWURADZE a metsew hɔn ho no."

column2: "Mma ɔhɔho biara nndzi adzekrɔnkrɔn no bi: ɔsɔfo ne mamforanyi
column3: anaa ɔpaanyi

column2: "Mbom sɛ ɔsɔfo bi tɔ ɔkra bi a
column3: ne sika enyadze no
column4: ɔno na ondzi bi; na hɔn so a wɔwo hɔn wɔ ne fie no
column5: hɔn na wondzi n'edziban no bi."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔsɔfo ne babaa bi wohyia no ma hɔho bi a
column3: mma onndzi ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn ohim afɔr no bi."

column2: "Mbom sɛ ɔsɔfo no ne babaa bi yɛ kunafo
column3: anaa wɔko no
column6: dɛ ne mbofraber mu a ondzi n'egya edziban no bi: ɔhɔho biara dze

column2: "Na sɛ nyimpa bi dzi adzekrɔnkrɔn no bi ber a onnyim a
column3: ɔno ɔmfa n'ebupɛn enum mu kor nto do
column4: na ɔmfa adzekrɔnkrɔn no mma ɔsɔfo no."

column2: "Na mma wonngu Israelmba hɔn ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn a wɔdze brɛ EWURADZE no ho fi;"
"amma wɔaannsoa asodzi ho mbusu biara
column3: sɛ wodzi hɔn ndzɛmba krɔnkrɔn no a: na emi nye EWURADZE a metsew hɔn ho no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column8: Obiara a ofi Israel ofi mu no
column9: anaa ofi Israel mu ahɔho mu a ɔdze n'ayɛyɛdze ba
column11: anaa hɔn ayamuyi afɔr mu biara a wɔdze brɛ EWURADZE bɔbɔ ɔhyew afɔr no;"

column2: "nyɛ onyin a onndzii dzɛm; anantwi mu o
column3: nkɔsɔw mu o
column4: anaa mpɔnkye mu o ama aasɔ enyi ama hom."

column2: "Mbom adze biara a odzi dzɛm no
column3: mma hom mmfa mmba: na ɔrennyɛ enyisɔdze mma hom."

column2: "Na obiara a ɔdze asomdwee afɔr bɛbrɛ EWURADZE dɛ ɔdze rehyɛ anohoba ma
column3: anaa ɔdze reyɛ ayamuyi afɔr no
column4: ofi anantwikuw anaa nguankuw mu no
column5: ɔmma ondzi mu na aasɔ enyi; dzɛm biara nnyi no ho."

column2: "Dza n'enyi efura
column3: anaa oebubu
column6: anaa ntwem anaa ase egu no ho no
column7: mma hom mmfa iyinom mmbrɛ EWURADZE
column8: na mma mmfa hɔn mu bi mmbɔ ogya afɔr so wɔ afɔrmbukyia no do mma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na ɔnantwisaa anaa eguambaa a no ho biribi bor do anaa ɔtɔ sin wɔ ne beebi no
column3: ayamuyi afɔr no fa no bɔ; na ɔyɛ anohobadze a ɔronnsɔ enyi."

column2: "Dza no ntɔhwɛbo ebubu
column3: anaa adwerew
column6: mma hom mmfa mmbrɛ EWURADZE; nkyii so mma hom nnyɛ dɛm wɔ hom asaase do."

column2: "Eso mma hom nngye iyinom mu biara wɔ ɔnanaben bi nsamu mmfa nnyɛ hom Nyankopɔn edziban mmba; osiandɛ hɔn sɛɛ wɔ hɔn ho
column3: dzɛm bi wɔ hɔn ho: wɔrennyɛ enyisɔdze mma hom."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column8: ɔno ɔnko ne na n'ase nda esuon; na ofi da a otsia awɔtwe no dze rokɔ no
column9: ɔsɔ enyi dɛ ogya afɔr ayɛyɛdze ma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔnantwiber o
column3: oguamber o
column4: mma hom nnku ɔno nye ne ba nyina da kor."

column2: "Na sɛ hom bɔ aseda afɔr ma EWURADZE a
column3: hom mbɔ ma ɔnsɔ enyi mma hom."

column2: "Da no ara na wondzi; mma hom nngya mu bi mma adze nkye do: emi nye EWURADZE."
"Dɛm ntsi hom nsie me mbra
column3: na wondzi do: emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na mma hom nngu me dzin krɔnkrɔn no ho fi: na mo ho bɛtsew wɔ Israelmba mu: emi nye EWURADZE a metsew hom ho no a"
"medze hom fi Egypt asaase do bae
column3: dɛ mebɛyɛ hom Nyankopɔn no: emi nye EWURADZE."
